name: Monster Meet Dot Com
description:
Your name is Ai Tsun, a nonbinary person of 22 years of age, and have just graduated from college. 

You have joined the hot new dating website TabooChat. It’s the number one dating site for adult singles! Rated 5 Stars by Tired Magazine! Ars Mechanica gave a glowing review of it!  

Who will you find on this site? Is it the crossdresser with a hidden secret, a shy nerdy orc girl with big assets (which may or may not be the assets that you expect), or a certain plumber from a fungal kingdom.

Made for the UCI VGDC Spring 2020 Game Jam.

CREDITS

Molina Mey - Director, Producer, Programmer

Alice "Jun" Lee - UI Designer, Programmer

Art:  Sabella "P4r4d0x1c" Hunter; twitter.com/p4r4d0x1c

Srayan "ValorZard" Jana - Writer

Avineesh "Avi" Kompella - Programmer, Voice Actor, Writer

Brandon Nguyen - Designer, Voice Actor, Producer, Audio

VOICE ACTORS

Louis (Bario): Avineesh "Avi" Kompella

Vlad (TomGirl): Brandon Nguyen 

D'jala (CutiePie235) Sabella Hunter
